scripts.build: npm run build:codesets && npm run build:escoApi
scripts.build:codesets: npm run prebuild && npm -C apps/codesets install && npm -C apps/codesets run build
scripts.build:escoApi: npm run prebuild && npm -C apps/escoApi install && npm -C apps/escoApi run build
scripts.deploy:codesets: npm install && npm run build:codesets && pulumi -C apps/codesets up
scripts.deploy:escoApi: npm install && npm run build:escoApi && pulumi -C apps/escoApi up
